answers.text: To repeat a block of code a specific number of times

To define a function with multiple steps

questions.question: What does a function in programming do?

Stores data that can be accessed throughout the program
Controls the overall flow of the program

questions.question: What is the purpose of object-oriented programming (OOP)?

answers.text: To organize code into reusable modules with properties and methods
To improve the speed and performance of programs
To simplify complex calculations with mathematical functions
Functions that can access and retain variables from their outer scope
Special data types used to store large amounts of data
Keywords used to control program flow (e.g., if, else)

questions.question: What is the Single Page Application (SPA) development approach?

answers.text: Creates a dynamic web app with a single HTML page that updates content without full page reloads
A framework for building responsive websites that adapt to different screen sizes
A method for securing web applications from unauthorized access

questions.question: What does asynchronous programming allow for?

answers.text: Executing multiple tasks concurrently without blocking the main thread
